text: Hello, How you doing
Great thanks, Im here to talk about the childrens charity.
Yes, Hope you aware whats going with child who died from hunger
I am mostly aware yes. This is why i would love to donate an amount.

You are such a good personality .. How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.
I not sure, how many children are in need of a donation? This will impact my decision on how much to give.
1000 childrens at the first slot
Right, it will probably have to be 80% of my task payment then. I'd love to help 1000 children.
Thanks so much.
No problem, what day is the charity meet up then?
We will circulate the information to all the volunteers soon .
Great, and can i bring family members to the donation event?
Sure , everyone are welcome
Great what time is it on?
Falls on morning timeslot and venue details will be shared shortly after we cosolidated the donators
Okay great, is there parking for the venue or should i get a taxi there?
You will have a parking slot available . However, based on our venue finalization we can check the feasability for everyone.
Thanks. Just to confirm, I'm donating 80% of my task amount.
sure thanks again
Thanks very much, nice speaking to you.
